background: Leads RTS documentary commissioning with focus on preserving national history and identity, Serbian culture and heritage, and exploring social change through public service storytelling.
thematic_priorities: Social and political issues in contemporary Serbia
content_not_wanted: Projects without clear Serbian cultural or historical relevance
Light entertainment or purely commercial factual formats
target_audience: Viewers seeking cultural heritage and socially relevant docs
technical_requirements: Archive/rights cleared; subtitling for international co-productions
current_calls: Projects on Serbian heritage and WWII history
submission_process: Project synopsis with subject relevance and audience
name: Gordana Jevtić
